amendment.description: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting that such Housing Authority or other manager shall prevent a household from occupying such a dwelling unit, and shall provide priority for occupancy in such dwelling units.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting that such Housing Authority or other manager shall prevent a household from occupying such a dwelling unit, and shall provide priority for occupancy in such dwelling units.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Financial Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Financial Services amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
